name: sark
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an island in the English Channel. It is one of the smallest of the group of islands known as the Channel Islands: There are no cars on Sark.
More examplesFewer examplesGuernsey forms the Bailiwick of Guernsey with Alderney, Sark, and some smaller islands.On holiday in Sark, he met Sue, now his wife.an islet off the western coast of Sark I decided to go on a painting trip to the island of Sark, in the Channel Islands.
